moves.1. e4: I liked open games at the time.
moves.2. Nf3: Always. I was anticipating a Ruy Lopez.
moves.2... f6: Looking back with 20 years of hindsight, not the best move J. B. could have played.
moves.3... c6: I'm guessing he intended 4...P-Q4, shutting off the Bishop.
moves.4. Nxe5: What the hell, may as well be adventurous.
moves.5. Qh5+: That infamous lightning-stroke, Q-R5 ch, shows up again.
moves.5... Ke7: 5...P-N3 wouldn't help much... though it would have stopped the immediate checkmate. [5...P-N3 6 QxKP ch followed by 7 QxR would have supplied me with a winning material advantage.]
moves.6. Qxe5#: We barely sat down, and the game is over.
